name: commonform.org
description: web interface for the composition, verification, and sharing of form contracts

scripts.analyze: jshint source test && jscs source test # Static analysis for logic and style errors
scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles && npm run documents # Generate production distribution
scripts.scripts: NODE_ENV=production browserify -g uglifyify source/index.js -d | exorcist build/commonform.js.map > build/commonform.js # Generate production JavaScript bundle
scripts.styles: cat source/*.less | lessc - | cssmin > build/commonform.css # Generate production CSS bundle
scripts.documents: html-minifier -c .html-minifier.json --o build/index.html source/index.html # Generate production HTML documents
scripts.watch: watchify --verbose --debug source/index.js -o build/commonform.js # Regenerate developer JavaScript bundle on source change
scripts.start: if [ ! -f .http.pid ] ; then http-server -p 8081 build > .http.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .http.pid ; fi # Start an HTTP server, saving PID
scripts.stop: kill $(cat .http.pid) ; rm .http.pid # Stop the HTTP server
scripts.startphantom: if [ ! -f .phantom.pid ] ; then phantomjs --webdriver=4444 > .phantom.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .phantom.pid ; fi # Start a PhantomJS WebDriver server, saving PID
scripts.stopphantom: kill $(cat .phantom.pid) ; rm .phantom.pid # Stop the PhantomJS WebDriver server
scripts.precommit: npm run analyze && npm run build && npm run test # Git pre-commit hook
scripts.travis: npm run precommit # Run by Travis CI
